a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Global injuries from natural disasters, All disasters, 1900 to 2024
Global number of people injured from natural disaster events. This is defined as "people suffering from physical
injuries, trauma or an illness requiring immediate medical assistance as a direct result of a disaster."
Note: Data includes disasters recorded up to April 2024.
